title: Bug 2120 - MRU File List is not persisted between sessions
OB: The files that were previously opened do not appear in the File menu's Most Recently Used (MRU) list when the workbench is restarted.
EB: The files that were previously opened should appear in the File menu's MRU list even after the workbench is restarted.
SR: To reproduce the issue: 1. Start the workbench. 2. Open 2 or 3 files. 3. Shutdown the workbench. 4. Restart the workbench and observe the File menu's MRU list.
